recipesJson.name: Smokey Pistachio Custard
recipesJson.author: soulchkn
recipesJson.description:
Here we have a fairly simple and straight forward Nutty Custard Profile.
I absolutely love Custard and wanted to combine my all time favorite nut into the mix, the all mighty Pistachio!
(TPA) Bavarian Cream 1% + (INW) Biscuit 1% + (FA) Custard Premium 2%, pulls together to create an extremely luscious, rich, and decadent Custard.
(TPA) Pistachio 4% produces a nice creamy nutty note, and when paired together with (FLV) Pistachio at 1% adds the textural top note to the nut that clearly makes it a distinct Pistachio.
Now by adding (TPA) Ry4 Double 4% is something I felt was crucial to give the recipe a nice deep aroma, but also add some slight Vanilla & dark Caramel notes to give the impression as if the desert was finished off with a light brush of smoke. 
This is great off the shake, and fantastic after 3 days! However, if you can hold out for a couple weeks?... Wowza!! :)

I hope you enjoy this one as much as I do!
HAPPY MIXING, & HAPPY VAPING!!!
